subject: Mathematics
question_text: Given below are two statements : Statement (I) : On nitration of m-xylene with followed by oxidation, 4-nitrobenzene-1,3-dicarboxylic acid is obtained as the major product. Statement (II) : group is o/p-directing while group is m-directing group. In the light of the above statements, choose the 2025 (29 Jan Shift 2) JEE Main 2025 January JEE Main Previous Year Paper MathonGo K 3 [Fe(OH) 6 ] K 4 [Fe(OH) 6 ] Li, Na, Be, Mg, B A 2 O A 2 O 3 2 σ pi(π) 1402 kJ mol −1 834 kJ mol −1 1012 kJ mol −1 947 kJ mol −1 HNO 3 , H 2 SO 4 −CH 3 −NO 2
question_latex: Given below are two statements : Statement (I) : On nitration of m-xylene with followed by oxidation, 4-nitrobenzene-1,3-dicarboxylic acid is obtained as the major product. Statement (II) : group is $\frac{o}{p}$-directing while group is m-directing group. In the light of the above statements, choose the 2025 (29 Jan Shift 2) JEE Main 2025 January JEE Main Previous Year Paper MathonGo K 3 [Fe(OH) 6 ] K 4 [Fe(OH) 6 ] Li, Na, Be, Mg, B A 2 O A 2 O 3 2 σ pi(π) 1402 kJ mol −1 834 kJ mol −1 1012 kJ mol −1 947 kJ mol −1 HNO 3 , H 2 SO 4 −CH 3 −NO 2

options.text: (1) Both Statement I and Statement II are false
(2) Statement I is false but Statement II is true
(3) Statement I is true but Statement II is false
(4) Both Statement I and Statement II are true
